_header: Saint Lawrence good man was and in strong Martyrdom
Subjects: saints’ lives; Lawrence, saint, life of
_description: Life of St. Lawrence in the South English Legendary — couplets

BodAsh43.First Lines:
SEyn Laurance good mon was & In strong martirdomHe endede
                    anerþe is lif & to þe Ioie of heuene com …
BodAsh43.Last Lines:
…Nou ihesus uor þe grete pine þat seynt laurence uor
                    þe haddeBring ous to þulke Ioie þat þin angles him to
                    ladde

Bod779.First Lines:
Seint laurens good mon was And in strong martirdomhe ended on
                    erþe his lif & to þe ioye of heuene com…
Bod779.Last Lines:
…bringe vs to þat ilke blis þat lesteþ wit outen
                    ende& graunt vs alle þilke eritage & after oure day þedir
                    wende

BodEngPoeta1.First Lines:
SEint Laurence good mon was and in strong MartirdomHe endede here
                    on eorþe his lyf and in to þe Ioye of heuene com…
BodEngPoeta1.Last Lines:
…Nou Ihesu for þulke grete pyne þat seint Laurence for
                    þe haddeBring vs to þe Ioye of heuene þat þin Angels
                    his soule ladde. Amen.
BodEngPoeta1.Facsimiles:
Doyle,  I. A.,
                        ed.  
             The Vernon Manuscript. A Facsimile of Bodleian Library, Oxford, MS Eng.
                poet.a.1,
          with an introduction by A. I. Doyle. Cambridge: D. S. Brewer, 1987. 
Scase,  Wendy,  and  Nick Kennedy, eds.  
             A facsimile edition of the Vernon manuscript: Oxford, Bodleian Library, MS. Eng. Poet. A. 1.
         Oxford: The Bodleian Library, 2011.

                    erþe is lif & toþe ioie of heuene com…
BodEngPoetd200.Last Lines:

                    þe haddeBringe vs to þe ioie þat þine angeles bin

BodLauMis108.First Lines:
SEynt Laurence guod man was and in strong martyrdomHe endede here
                    on eorþe is liif and to þe Ioye of heuene he com…
BodLauMis108.Last Lines:
…Novþe Iesu for þe grete pine þat Seint laurence
                    here haddeVs bringue to þulke Ioye þat þine Aungels his
                    soule ladde

CULAdd3039.First Lines:
Sayne laurance was a noble man & in grete marterdomeHe endid
                    here is lyfe þer þurgh til heuen he comeDecius þe Emperoure
                    til al shrewdneȝ he drogheAnd Valeryan his Iustis a cursed man
                    ynoghe…
CULAdd3039.Last Lines:
…Now ihesu for þat grete pyne þat laurance tholed for
                    þeBringe vs to þat grete ioy þat neuer sal endid
                    be

                    eorþe is lif and to Ioie of heuene com…
CamCCC145.Last Lines:
…Nou ihesu for þe grete pine þat lauerance for þe
                    haddeBring us to Pulke ioie þat þin angles him to
                    ladde

CamMagPep2344.Last Lines:
